<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Event Handlers

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Defines code performed when hc command mode changes either because of (Left Ctrl + Space) shortcut or [[hcShowBar]] scripting command. Groups hc mode must contain at least one group for this command to work (see [[High Command]]). Attached code receives ''_isHighCommand'' boolean. 
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Since '''Arma 3''' ''v1.57'' a stackable version of this EH is available: [[Arma_3:_Event_Handlers/addMissionEventHandler#CommandModeChanged|CommandModeChanged]]</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''onCommandModeChanged''' code

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> code: [[Code]] or [[String]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>//Examples in-use can be found in:

//ca\modules\HC\data\scripts\HC_GUI.sqf
//A3\modules_f\HC\data\scripts\HC_GUI.sqf</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]], [[hcAllGroups]], [[hcGroupParams]], [[hcLeader]], [[hcRemoveAllGroups]], [[hcRemoveGroup]], [[hcSelected]], [[hcSelectGroup]], [[hcSetGroup]], [[hcShowBar]], [[hcShownBar]], [[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>
